column1: Little Goat Diner////The waiting area is often filled to max capacity
column2: but luckily my Sis put our name in by the time I arrive. She's standing outside and points up at the clouds
column3: asking if I see the island
column10: puffy white missiles that slowly glide to the city's skyline. She'd just finished a tough workout and asked to meet her here. This is the perfect place for a carb replenish.
